content.answer: Christ's exaltation consisteth in his rising again from the dead on the third day, in ascending up into heaven, in sitting at the right hand of God the Father, and in coming to judge the world at the last day.
content.name: Shorter Catechism
content.question: Wherein consisteth Christ's exaltation?

content.answer: The estate of Christ's exaltation comprehendeth his resurrection, ascension, sitting at the right hand of the Father, and his coming again to judge the world.

that he was buried, that he was raised on the third day in accordance with the Scriptures, (ESV)

You ascended on high,

even among the rebellious, that the Lord God may dwell there.

and he gave gifts to men.” (ESV)
